casebody.data:
(Republished)

The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v Charles Wright, Appellant.

Judgment, Supreme Court, New York County (Irving Lang, J., at trial and sentence; Schwalb, J., at persistent felony offender hearing), rendered on June 24, 1980, unanimously affirmed. No opinion. Concur — Kupferman, J. P., Sandler, Sullivan and Bloom, JJ. [111 AD2d 600.]
